_header: In a pistle that Paul wrought
_description: Each Man ought Himself to know — nine 12-line stanzas

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
IN a Pistel þat Poul wrouȝtI fond hit writen & seide
                    riht þis…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Þat cristes face mai ben vr foodeffor vche mon
                    ouȝte him self to knowe

                poet.a.1,

         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
IN a Pistel þat Poul wrouhtI founde hit writen & seide
                    riht þis…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…Þat cristes face may ben vr foodeffor vche mon ouȝt
                    hym self to knowe
BLAdd22283.Attributed Title: Explicit A song knowe þi self (f. 129vb)
